Posts.Content: As I've been told by my oncologists and by nutritionists, everything in moderation. We all know eating healthy and cutting back on sweets and crap like that is definetitly better for us. Just dont over do it
Posts.Title: Diet

Posts.Content: As I've been told by my oncologists and by nutritionists, everything in moderation. We all know eating healthy and cutting back on sweets and crap like that is definetitly better for us. Just dont over do it
Posts.Title: Diet

Posts.Content: Im sorry about your dads condition. As you probably have found out, every alternative has the "success storys" and the Ive heard, and this will cure it. The true problems with alternatives, is most are proven to do nothing and maybe even make it worse. If they were the cureall be all, everyone would be taking it. Before taking any alternatives please talk to his doc about it and make sure it wont cause any more harm. Best of luck. here is some infor on it. "Several medical case reports have described serious side effects in people with cancer who have taken cesium chloride, including life-threatening problems with heart rhythm, seizures, loss of consciousness, and electrolyte imbalances. Cesium appears to take the place of potassium, a common element in the body, which can cause many of these problems" The few studies done on it should it did nothing. josh josh
Posts.Title: Any success stories with alternative treatments? Please, this is for my father
